Package poised

Class ReadAndWriteToDatabase

java.lang.Object
poised.ReadAndWriteToDatabase
public abstract class ReadAndWriteToDatabase extends Object
Abstract class that reads and writes project object information to and from a database.

A list of Project attribute information is read from the PoisePMS database then populated into new Project and Person objects and added to the projectList.

When a new project object is captured, the formatted string object is appended to the text file.

Version:
2.0
Author:
Megan Bisschoff

  • Method Details

    • readProjectsFromDatabase

      public static List<Project> readProjectsFromDatabase() throws SQLException
      Method selects all data from each of the project, manager, engineer, architect and customer tables.

      Project and Person objects are initialised by getting and setting the string values into the respective Project and Person attributes.

      An array list is inititalised which returns each poiseProjects added to the list.

    • Project number
    • Project name
    • Project type
    • Project addres
    • Project ERF number
    • Fee total
    • Fee paid
    • Project deadline
    • Project finalisation status
    • Customers full name
    • Customers contact number
    • Customers email
    • Customers address
    • Architects full name
    • Architects contact number
    • Architects email
    • Architects address
    • Contractors full name
    • Contractors contact number
    • Contractors email
    • Contractors address
      • Returns:
      an arraylist of project objects.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • writeProjectToDatabase

      public static void writeProjectToDatabase(Project poiseProject) throws SQLException
      Method gets Project and Person values of the given project object and inserts the data into their respective project, manager, engineer, architect and customer tables.
      Parameters:
      poiseProject - a newly created project object.
      Throws:
      SQLException
